League of Legends V13.24[]

Client[]

ARAM Clash
  • It's time for the last Clash tournament of the year, and what better way to celebrate than by fighting it out on the Howling Abyss.
    • Registration Begins: December 4, 2023 (11:00 AM Local Time)
    • Tournament Days: December 9 and 10, 2023 (~4-7 PM Local, varies by region)
Mythic Shop Rotation
  • In:
    • Prestige PROJECT: Irelia
    • Prestige K/DA Kai'Sa
    • Prestige Spirit Blossom Master Yi
    • Prestige Battle Academia Lux
    • Hextech Alistar
    • Hextech Malzahar
    • Mythic Chroma for Storm Dragon Lee Sin
    • Mythic Chroma for Dawnbringer Riven
    • Crystalis Motus Ashe
    • Reclaimed Chroma for Crystalis Motus Ashe + Icon
    • Oops, Did I Do That? emote for Crystalis Motus Ashe
    • Crystalis Motus Ward Skin
    • Winterblessed 2022 Mythic Essence Icon
    • Lunar Revel 2023 Mythic Essence Icon
    • Fairie Court 2023 Mythic Essence Icon
    • Inkshadow 2023 Mythic Essence Icon
    • Soul Fighter 2023 Mythic Essence Icon
    • Worlds 2023 Mythic Essence Icon
    • Faerie Court 2023 Grab Bag
  • Out:
    • Prestige Cyber Halo Janna
    • Prestige K/DA Evelynn
    • Prestige Arcanist Zoe
    • Prestige Blood Moon Aatrox
    • Hextech Kog'Maw

    • Neo PAX Jax

    • Chosen One emote for Crystalis Motus Taliyah
    • Mythic Chroma for Galaxy Slayer Zed + Icon
    • Mythic Chroma for High Noon Senna + Icon
Ranked Season 2024
  • Season 2023 Split 2 ends at 23:59:59 January 9, 2024 according to regional local time.
  • Season 2024 Split 1 starts at 12:00:00 January 10, 2024 according to regional local time everywhere except for LA1 and NA1: LA1 starts at 9am, Jan 10 CST; NA1 starts at 7am, Jan 10 PST.
  • The season transition experience will be similar to what we had in the past: Ranked queues will be disabled for a couple of hours, and will be brought back as soon as 14.1 is up, and a couple of hours after that, Split 1 will be officially launched! The ranked games played during the downtime won't count towards your new season progression. Shard transfers will be disabled before season end, and re-enabled after all end of season rewards are granted.
  • Ranked Season 2023 ends:
    • OC1 (Australia/Sydney): January 9, 23:59:59 AEDT (January 9, 04:59:59 PST)
    • JP1 (Asia/Tokyo): January 9, 23:59:59 JST (January 9, 06:59:59 PST)
    • KR1 (Asia/Seoul): January 9, 23:59:59 KST (January 9, 06:59:59 PST)
    • RU (Europe/Moscow): January 9, 23:59:59 MSK (January 9, 12:59:59 PST)
    • EUN1 (Europe/Warsaw): January 9, 23:59:59 CET (January 9, 14:59:59 PST)
    • TR1 (Europe/Istanbul): January 9, 23:59:59 GMT+3 (January 9, 12:59:59 PST)
    • EUW1 (Europe/London): January 9, 23:59:59 GMT (January 9, 15:59:59 PST)
    • BR1 (America/So Paulo): January 9, 23:59:59 GMT-3 (January 9, 18:59:59 PST)
    • LA2 (America/Buenos Aires): January 9, 23:59:59 GMT-3 (January 9, 18:59:59 PST)
    • LA1 (America/Mexico City): January 9, 23:59:59 CST (January 9, 21:59:59 PST)
    • NA1 (America/Los Angeles): January 9, 23:59:59 PST
    • VN (Asia/Ho Chi Minh City): January 9, 23:59:59 GMT+7 (January 9, 08:59:59 PST)
    • TH (Asia/Bangkok): January 9, 23:59:59 GMT+7 (January 9, 08:59:59 PST)
    • PH (Asia/Manila): January 9, 23:59:59 PHT (January 9, 07:59:59 PST)
    • TW (Asia/Taipei): January 9, 23:59:59 CST (January 9, 07:59:59 PST)
    • SG (Asia/Singapore): January 9, 23:59:59 GMT+8 (January 9, 07:59:59 PST)
The Return of Blue Essence Emporium
  • "Blue Essence Emporium is back! Youll be able to spend your Blue Essence on chromas released prior to July 2023, accessories, and more starting on December 13, 21:00 UTC. Weve also brought back the highly requested mystery wards and icons so definitely take advantage of that while you can. The Emporium will remain open until December 27, 21:00 UTC, so make sure to drop by and drop that Blue Essence! Due to technical issues weve disabled the ability to gift mystery wards and icons, however this feature will return in a future Blue Essence Emporium."

Game[]

Settings
  • New: The player can manually and globally override the targeting behavior of all their abilities that by default force the caster to walk into range of a target unit or location when it is further than the spell's maximum range. When enabled, all of these spells may cast at maximum range instead, when targeted outside of maximum range.
    • The toggle can be found under Game -> Gameplay -> "Clamp cast target location within max range".

Champions[]

Annie
  • Hextech Annie
    • Bug Fix: Fire VFX in her idle animation no longer disappears momentarily.
Azir
  • Arise!
    • Base damage increased to 50 / 67 / 84 / 101 / 118 from 50 / 65 / 80 / 95 / 110.
Braum
  • Stats
    • Base mana regeneration increased to 7 from 6.
  • Glacial Fissure
    • Minimum knock up duration increased to 0.6 seconds from 0.3.
Briar
  • Stats
    • Attack speed ratio increased to 0.669 from 0.644.
    • Base armor reduced to 30 from 32.
  • Head Rush
    • Base damage reduced to 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 from 60 / 95 / 130 / 165 / 200.
  • Blood Frenzy
    • Bonus attack speed reduced to 55 / 70 / 85 / 100 / 115% from 60 / 75 / 90 / 105 / 120%.
  • Chilling Scream
    • Damage reduction reduced to 35% from 40%.
  • Certain Death
    • Damage type changed to magic from physical.
    • AP ratio increased to 120% AP from 110% AP.
    • Bonus AD ratio reduced to 50% bonus AD from 75%.
Draven
  • Whirling Death
    • Bug Fix: No longer causes himself to be executed if the missiles return to him while the number of his Adoration stacks were higher than his current health at the start of the cast.
Elise
  • Venomous Bite
    • Bug Fix: Hit SFX now plays correctly while in Spider Form.
Evelynn
  • Hate Spike
    • Bug Fix: SFX now properly plays even if the target is in close proximity.
Galio
  • Winds of War
    • Cooldown reduced to 12 / 11 / 10 / 9 / 8 seconds from 12 / 11.5 / 11 / 10.5 / 10.
Gragas
  • Happy Hour
    • Cooldown reduced to 12 / 10 / 8 / 6 (based on level) seconds from 12 at all levels.
Hwei - New champion
  • Signature of the Visionary - Innate
    • Innate: Hwei's damaging abilities mark enemies hit for 4 seconds. Damaging them with a different ability consumes the mark to create an explosion beneath them, dealing 35 − 180 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) bonus magic damage to enemies in the area after 0.85 seconds.
    • Effect Radius: 285.
  • Subject: Disaster - Q
    • Active: Hwei enters a disastrous mood, gaining access to its abilities as well as Wash Brush. He will exit the mood upon casting any of them.
    • Mana Cost: 100 / 105 / 110 / 115 / 120.
    • Cooldown: 10 / 9 / 8 / 7 / 6 seconds.
    • Cast Time: None.
  • Devastating Fire - QQ
    • Active - QQ: Hwei slings a fireball in the target direction that explodes upon colliding with the first enemy or reaching maximum range, dealing 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 (+ 60% AP) (+ 4 / 4.5 / 5 / 5.5 / 6% of target's maximum health) magic damage to all nearby enemies. The damage based on the target's health ratio is capped at 250 against monsters.
    • Cast Time: 0.25 seconds, Range: 800, Speed: 2000.
  • Severing Bolt - QW
    • Active - QW: Hwei calls upon a lightning bolt to strike at the target location after 1 second, dealing 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+ 25% AP) magic damage to enemies within the area.
    • Against enemies that are immobilized or isolated from their allies, Severing Bolt deals 200 / 237.5 / 275 / 312.5 / 350% increased damage based on the target's missing health. This bonus damage is capped at 300 against monsters.
    • Severing Bolt deals 50% damage to minions and non-epic monsters.
    • Cast Time: 0.5 seconds, Target Range: 1900.
  • Molten Fissure - QE
    • Active - QE: Hwei marks a blazing path in the target direction. After 0.7 seconds, the path erupts into volcanic explosions every 0.175 seconds from the point of cast. Each explosion creates a shockwave that deals 20 / 40 / 60 / 80 / 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
    • Each explosion also leaves a lava fissure in its wake. A fissure lasts for 2.5 seconds, dealing 5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25 (+ 6.25% AP) magic damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies within the area and slowing them by 30%.
    • Molten Fissure's damage is reduced to 60% against minions and increased to 135% against monsters.
    • Cast Time: 0.35 seconds.
  • Subject: Serenity - W
    • Active: Hwei enters a serene mood, gaining access to its abilities as well as Wash Brush. He will exit the mood upon casting any of them.
    • Mana Cost: 90 / 95 / 100 / 105 / 110.
    • Cooldown: 18 / 17.5 / 17 / 16.5 / 16 seconds.
    • Cast Time: None.
  • Fleeting Current - WQ
    • Active - WQ: Hwei forms a current of water in the target direction, creating a path for 4 / 4.5 / 5 / 5.5 / 6 seconds that grants him and allied champions 20 / 22.5 / 25 / 27.5 / 30% (+ 2% per 100 AP)  bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds, refreshing every 0.125 seconds while they remain in the area.
    • Cast Time: 0.25 seconds.
  • Pool of Reflection - WW
    • Active - WW: Hwei summons a pool of water at the target location, creating a protective zone for 3 seconds that grants him and allied champions a shield for 45 / 55 / 65 / 75 / 85 (+ 30% AP) for 0.5 seconds while within the area. The shield refreshes and increases in strength by 3.75 / 4.58 / 5.42 / 6.25 / 7.08 (+ 2.5% AP) every 0.264 seconds over the duration while they remain in the area, up to a total maximum shield of 90 / 110 / 130 / 150 / 170 (+ 60% AP).
    • Pool of Reflection's shield strength is reduced to 50% for allies.
    • Cast Time: 0.3 seconds.
  • Stirring Lights - WE
    • Active - WE: Hwei surrounds himself in swirling flares that empower his next 3 basic attacks or ability hits within 9 seconds to each deal 25 / 35 / 45 / 55 / 65 (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage and restore 45 / 50 / 55 / 60 / 65  mana.
    • Stirring Lights' bonus damage is reduced to 50% against minions or monsters if applied by his area of effect abilities.
    • Cast Time: None.
  • Subject: Torment - E
    • Active: Hwei enters a tumultuous mood, gaining access to its abilities as well as Wash Brush. He will exit the mood upon casting any of them.
    • Mana Cost: 50 / 55 / 60 / 65 / 70.
    • Cooldown: 15 / 14 / 13 / 12 / 11 seconds.
    • Cast Time: None.
  • Grim Visage - EQ
    • Active - EQ: Hwei launches a terrifying grin in the target direction that deals 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 (+ 55% AP) magic damage to the first enemy hit and fears them for 1 second, during which they are slowed by 60%.
    • Cast Time: 0.25 seconds.
  • Gaze of the Abyss - EW
    • Active - EW: Hwei tosses an eyeball to the target location. Upon arrival, it expands into a dark gaze for 1.35 to 3 seconds based on cast distance, granting sight in a larger area. After 0.7 seconds of being placed, the eye locks onto the nearest visible enemy champion, launching itself at the target after 0.35 seconds and colliding with the first enemy hit to deal 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 (+ 55% AP) magic damage, reveal them for 2.5 seconds, and root them for 1.2 / 1.4 / 1.6 / 1.8 / 2 seconds.
    • Cast Time: 0.25 seconds, Effect Radius: 350.
  • Crushing Maw - EE
    • Active - EE: Hwei conjures a jaw at the target location that snaps after 0.627 seconds, dealing 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 (+ 55% AP) magic damage to enemies in the area and slowing them by 40 / 47.5 / 55 / 62.5 / 70%, decaying over 1.25 seconds. Enemies that are not standing at the center when the jaw snaps are pulled there.
    • Cast Time: 0.35 seconds.
  • Wash Brush - QR, WR, ER
    • Active - QR, WR, ER: Hwei exits his current mood without incurring its ability cost or cooldown.
    • Wash Brush can only be cast if Hwei has entered a mood.
    • Cast Time: None.
  • Spiraling Despair - R
    • Active: Hwei launches a globule of pure despair in the target direction that collides with the first enemy champion hit, afflicting them with an aura that grows over 3 seconds, reveals the target, and grants sight within its radius. Enemies within are both dealt 2.5 / 5 / 7.5 (+ 1.25% AP) magic damage and applied a stack of Despair every 0.25 seconds.
    • Despair: For each stack, the target is slowed by 10% for 0.25 seconds, stacking up to 12 times.
    • At the end of the duration or when the target dies, the aura explodes to deal 200 / 300 / 400 (+ 80% AP) magic damage to enemies within and remove all Despair stacks from affected enemies.
    • Spiraling Despair can only be cast if Hwei has not entered a mood.
    • Mana Cost: 100.
    • Cooldown: 140 / 110 / 80 seconds.
    • Cast Time: 0.25 seconds, Range: 1340, Effect Radius: 500, Width: 160, Speed: 1400.
Ivern
  • Stats
    • Base health reduced to 630 from 655.
  • Triggerseed
    • Slow reduced to 45 / 50 / 55 / 60 / 65% from 50 / 55 / 60 / 65 / 70%.
K'Sante
  • Path Maker
    • Mana cost reduced to 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60 from 60 / 65 / 70 / 75 / 80.
    • Armor ratio increased to 50% bonus armor from 30%.
    • Magic resistance ratio increased to 50% bonus magic resistance from 30%.
Leona
  • Eclipse
    • Base bonus resistances increased 20 / 27.5 / 35 / 42.5 / 50 from 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40.
  • Solar Flare
    • Base damage increased to 150 / 225 / 300 from 100 / 175 / 250.
Lucian
  • Relentless Pursuit
    • Cooldown reduced to 19 / 17.75 / 16.5 / 15.25 / 14 seconds from 22 / 20 / 18 / 16 / 14.
Mordekaiser
  • Obliterate
    • AP ratio increased to 70% AP from 60% AP.
  • Realm of Death
    • New Effect: Now reveals the target for the duration of the cast.
Morgana
  • Tormented Shadow
    • Bug Fix: Pool VFX is now visible over terrain.
Neeko
  • Inherent Glamour
    • Bug Fix: No longer is allowed to inherit the attributes of more than one unit at a time, which sometimes led her to have 2.5 attack speed.
Qiyana
  • Stats
    • Base mana increased to 375 from 320.
    • Mana growth increased to 60 from 50.
Senna
  • High Noon Senna
    • Bug Fix: Now properly plays the transition animation for exiting her Homeguard run animation.
  • PROJECT: Senna
    • Dawning Shadow
      • Bug Fix: VFX is no longer cut off from elevation change when cast from lower ground.
Sylas
  • Ashen Slayer Sylas, Battle Wolf Sylas, Prestige PROJECT: Sylas, PROJECT: Sylas
    • Hijack
      • Bug Fix: Clone model from Hallucinate no longer has corrupted textures if the enemy Shaco was using the following skins: Prestige Soul Fighter Shaco, Soul Fighter Shaco, Winterblessed Shaco, Crime City Nightmare Shaco and Arcanist Shaco.
Syndra
  • General
    • New splash artwork for Original Syndra.
Talon
  • Noxian Diplomacy
    • New Effect: Dash cast now resets his basic attack timer as well.
Vel'Koz
  • Void Rift
    • Bug Fix: Rift missile and the entire visual effects now spawn even if he dies in the first 0.25 seconds after casting. Consequently, the rift collapse damage is now accompanied by its proper visuals in this case.
  • Tectonic Disruption
    • New Effect: Missile now spawns near the target location instead of at his location.
    • Bug Fix: Spell no longer fizzles out it if he moved further than 1100 units away from the target location before the end of the cast time (e.g. using Flash).
Viego
  • Sovereign's Domination
    • Bug Fix: Can now properly cast Phase to switch weapons while possessing Aphelios.
Xayah
  • Deadly Plumage
    • Bug Fix: Empowered feather missiles no longer disappear in their flight to the target if they moved too far away.
Zeri
  • Stats

Guinsoo's Rageblade
  • Bug Fix: Seething Sorrow's Seething Strike now properly grants stacks.

Howling Abyss[]

Map-specific balacing
  • Ashe
    • Outgoing damage modifier changed to 0% from -10%.
  • Riven
    • Shielding modifier changed to 0% from +20%.

Arena[]

Gameplay
  • Gates
    • Hex-gates have been added to each of the 4 battle arenas, which function the same as those on the Hextech Rift map on Summoner's Rift. Champions on either team can interact with these gates to dash to the other side of them. Gates have a 7-second cooldown after being activated.
  • Downed State/Reviving
    • When a champion on either team takes fatal damage for the first time each round, they enter a downed state where they are essentially dead. After 11-8 seconds (based on round number) of being downed, their ally can stand near where they entered the state for 3 seconds to afterwards revive them, healing them for 150 − 1425 (based on level) and causing them to become untargetable, invulnerable, and unable to attack or cast spells for 0.75 seconds. They will also gain 30% damage reduction, 75% bonus movement speed, and 50% Tenacity for 3 seconds, decaying after 0.75 seconds over the remaining duration.
      • The amount of time required for the revive to occur is cumulative; leaving the downed area will not reset the timer.
      • The ally must not be under a resurrection effect in order to perform the revive.
      • Revive duration is reduced based on the ally's heal and shield power as well as their missing health.
  • Cameos
    • The cameos for the following champions have been removed: Evelynn, Jhin, Lux, Naafiri, Samira, Shaco, and Viego.
    • The following cameos have been added:
      • Sylas' Great Mage Rebellion:
        • At the start of the combat round, Sylas breaks the chains to replace each champion's non- Flash summoner spell with a random ultimate ability. Once the hijacked ability is cast, the spell in the slot is reverted back to the original one.
      • Thresh's Midnight Express:
        • Thresh roams around the battlefield to provide assistance. He periodically casts his Dark Passage to the champion furthest from him which also grants the nearest champion with the lowest health a continuous shield. Any champion on either team can interact with the lantern on the ground to dash to Thresh's location.
          • If one of a team's champions is caught and downed in the Ring of Fire, Thresh will move to that player's location and throw his lantern towards their ally. Additionally, if one team outnumbers the other in alive members, he will always throw his lantern to the disadvantaged team.
  • Items
    • Hellfire Hatchet - New exclusive item
      • Cost: 3000.
      • Stats: 40 attack damage, 12 lethality, 15% omnivamp.
      • Unique Passive - Char: Basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against enemies heal you for 2% of target's current health and apply a burn that deals 2% of target's missing health (+ 12% bonus AD) (+ 10% AP) physical damage every second over 4 seconds.
    • Perplexity - New exclusive item
      • Cost: 3000.
      • Stats: 70 ability power, 22% armor penetration, 30% magic penetration, 8% movement speed.
      • Unique Passive - Giant Slayer: Deal 0% − 22% (based on maximum health difference) bonus damage against enemy champions with greater maximum health than you.
    • Sword of the Blossoming Dawn - New exclusive item
      • Cost: 3000.
      • Stats: 15 ability haste, 40 ability power, 200 health, 15% heal and shield power.
      • Unique Passive - Effervescence: Gain 1.2% bonus attack speed per 1% heal and shield power.
      • Unique Passive - Peppermint: Basic attacks on-hit cause the most wounded and nearest allied champion to be healed for 15 − 45 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 7% AP).
    • Wooglet's Witchcap - Re-added
      • Obtained from the Quest: Wooglet's Witchcap augment.
        • Stats: 300 ability power, 20 ability haste, 50 armor.
        • Unique Active - Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items.
    • Wordless Promise - New exclusive item
      • Cost: 3000.
      • Stats: 25 ability haste, 60 ability power, 15% heal and shield power.
      • Unique Active - Promise: Make a Promise to the target allied champion, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be promised to by one Wordless Promise at a time.
      • Unique Passive - Promise: While your Promised ally is tethered to you, gain ability power equal to 20% of Promised ally's AP, and grant your Promised ally ability haste equal to 20% of your ability haste.
  • Augments
    • No more than two champions can now possess the same augment.
    • The following augments have been added:
      • ADAPt, All For You, Angel of Retribution, Big Brain, Blood Brother, Bread And Butter, Bread And Cheese, Bread And Jam, Center of the Universe, Chain Lightning, Clothesline, Critical Healing, Dark Blessing, Deathtouch, Dematerialize, Desecrator, Don't Chase, Doomsayer, Draw Your Sword, EscAPADe, Fey Magic, Flashbang, Flashy, Fully Automated, Giant Slayer, Goredrink, Heavy Hitter, Hold Very Still, Holy Fire, Homeguard, Impassable, It's Killing Time, Laser Eyes, Magic Missile, Marksmage, Minionmancer, Mirror Image, Nesting Doll, Oathsworn, Orbital Laser, Parasitic Relationship, Plaguebearer, Quest: Steel Your Heart, Quest: Urf's Champion, Quest: Wooglet's Witchcap, Raid Boss, Restart, Scopier Weapons, Scopiest Weapons, Self Destruct, Serve Beyond Death, Skilled Sniper, Slap Around, Snowball Fight!, Spellwake, Spin To Win, Stackosaurus Rex, Summoner's Roulette, Twice Thrice, Ultimate Unstoppable.
    • The following augments have been removed:
      • Buckle Up, Evocation, Midnight Express, Windspeaker's Blessing, Zhonya's Epiphany.
  • Mode Queue
    • Maximum party size increased to 4 players from 2.
      • When queuing with 3 players the party will be given the option to select who will be matched with a random player.
    • Rating Restrictions
      • Players with an 8,100 rating or higher can now queue with only 1 other player, and players must be within 1,000 rating of one another to queue together.
        • Previously, players with a Gladiator rating could only queue with other Gladiator rated players.
    • Private Matchmaking
      • A full party of 8 players can queue together for an unrated game. There are no rating restrictions in private matches.
  • Rating System
    • Arena ratings from the initial launch have been reset, and all players will begin in Wood tier with a 500 rating.
    • Gold tier rating increased to 3300 from 3200.
    • Gladiator tier rating increased to 4000 from 3800.
  • Challenges
    • New Challenges for the Arena mode in particular have been added:
      • Cream of the Crop: Deal the most damage to champions in the game.
      • Dancing Shoes: Dodge 5 skillshots (ranged untargeted abilities) within 8 seconds.
      • Double Down: Get double kills.
      • The Wall: Take 10,000 pre-mitigation damage from champions in a single fight without dying.
      • Outplaying the Odds: Get kills while more enemy champions than friendly ones are nearby.
      • I've Got You!: Save an ally who would have otherwise taken lethal damage with a heal or shield.
Arena-specific balancing
  • Arena Stat Adjustments (buff)
    • Removed: No longer grants an increasing amount of tenacity and slow resist the longer a champion is immobilized.
    • New Effect: If a champion has been immobilized or unable to act by crowd control for 5 of the last 7 seconds, they are cleansed and gain crowd control immunity for 3 seconds.
    • Bonus base health changed to ( 50 − 900 / 150 − 1150) (based on level) from ( 200 − 700 / 300 − 800) (based on level).
    • Bonus resistances increased to ( 8 − 36 / 2 − 16) (based on level) from ( 4 − 8 / 2 − 4) (based on level).
    • Removed: No longer grants 20% bonus attack speed to ranged champions.

      • Adaptive force per stack increased to 1.8 − 3.3 (based on level) bonus Attack Damage or 3 − 5.5 (based on level) Ability Power (Adaptive) from 1.2 − 2.7 (based on level) bonus Attack Damage or 2 − 4.5 (based on level) Ability Power (Adaptive).
      • Healing increased to ( 10% / 8%) of damage dealt from ( 8% / 5%).
    • Lethal Tempo
      • Bonus attack speed per stack increased to ( 13% − 18% / 8% − 12%) (based on level) from ( 10% − 15% / 5% − 9%) (based on level).
  • Tank It or Leave It
    • Damage reduction reduced to 25% from 30%.
  • The Brutalizer
    • Lethality reduced to 10 from 15.
  • Tormentor
    • Damage per tick reduced to 4% of target's maximum health from 5%.
  • Trueshot Prodigy
    • Damage increased to 250 − 750 (based on level) from 200 − 700 (based on level).
    • AD ratio increased to 140% bonus AD from 100%.
    • AP ratio increased to 100% AP from 90% AP.
  • Willing Sacrifice
    • Shield reduced to 25% current health from 30%.

Hotfixes[]

December 7th Hotfix[]

Hwei
  • Subject: Disaster
    • Mana cost reduced to 80 / 90 / 100 / 110 / 120 from 100 / 105 / 110 / 115 / 120.
  • Devastating Fire
    • AP ratio increased to 70% AP from 60% AP.
    • Health ratio increased to 4 / 5 / 6 / 7 / 8% of target's maximum health from 4 / 4.5 / 5 / 5.5 / 6%.
  • Grim Visage
    • AP ratio increased to 60% AP from 55% AP.
  • Gaze of the Abyss
    • AP ratio increased to 60% AP from 55% AP.
  • Crushing Maw
    • AP ratio increased to 60% AP from 55% AP.

December 11th Hotfix[]

Arena[]

Gameplay
  • Augments
    • Spin to Win
      • Bug Fix: now grants the proper damage bonus after being revived.
Arena-specific balancing
  • Gragas
    • Body Slam
      • Base damage reduced to 80 / 115 / 150 / 185 / 220 from 80 / 125 / 170 / 215 / 260.
      • Cooldown refund reduced to 25% from 40%.
  • Jhin
    • Whisper
      • Critical strike bonus movement speed per 1% bonus attack speed changed to 0.6% from 0.8%.
    • Dancing Grenade
      • Base damage reduced to 65 / 110 / 155 / 200 / 245 from 70 / 130 / 190 / 250 / 310.
      • AD ratio reduced to 70 / 80 / 90 / 100 / 110% AD from 80 / 90 / 100 / 110 / 120% AD.
  • Leona
    • Shield of Daybreak
      • Cooldown increased to 6 seconds from 5.
    • Eclipse
      • Cooldown increased to 14 / 13.5 / 13 / 12.5 / 12 seconds from 14 / 13 / 12 / 11 / 10.
  • Neeko
    • General
      • New Effect: Now gains 0 − 200 (based on level) bonus health.
    • Blooming Burst
      • Base damage increased to 90 / 140 / 190 / 240 / 290 from 80 / 125 / 170 / 215 / 260.
  • Pyke
    • Death from Below
      • Secondary target damage increased to 80% from 50%.
      • Your Cut gold reduced to 350 from 600.
  • Karthus
    • General
      • New Effect: Now gains 0 − 200 (based on level) bonus health.
    • Requiem
      • Base damage increased to 350 / 550 / 750 from 200 / 350 / 500.
      • AP ratio increased to 100% AP from 75% AP.
  • Zilean
    • General
      • New Effect: Now gains 0 − 200 (based on level) bonus health.
    • Time Bomb
      • Base damage increased to 100 / 165 / 230 / 295 / 360 from 75 / 115 / 165 / 230 / 300.
  • Liandry's Anguish
    • Bonus damage increased to 0% − 15% (based on target's bonus health) from 0% − 12%.
  • Sorcerer's Shoes
    • Magic penetration increased to 20 from 18.
  • Center of the Universe
    • Base damage reduced to 5 − 160 (based on level) from 10 − 180 (based on level).
  • Dark Blessing
    • Cursed Power to ability haste rate increased to 14% from 12%.
  • Dashing
    • Ability haste increased to 250 from 200.
  • Orbital Laser
    • Magic damage per tick increased to 40 − 120 (based on level) from 30 − 90 (based on level).
  • Spin to Win
    • Ability haste increased to 40 from 30.
    • Bonus damage increased to 40% from 30%.
  • Stackosaurus Rex
    • Stack bonus increased to 75% from 50%.
  • Steel Your Heart
    • Stack multiplier increased to 5 from 4.

December 12th Hotfix[]

Corki
  • Stats
    • Base health increased to 610 from 588.
    • Health growth reduced to 103 from 105.
    • Base attack damage increased to 59 from 55.
    • Attack damage growth reduced to 2.5 from 2.8.
Hwei
  • Stats
    • Base health increased to 580 from 545.
    • Base mana increased to 480 from 450.
    • Movement speed increased to 330 from 325.
  • Pool of Reflection
    • Effects now begin at the start of cast time.
  • Gaze of the Abyss
    • Duration changed to 3 seconds from 1.353 seconds based on cast distance.
    • Seeking delay reduced to 0.65 seconds from 0.7.
    • Launch delay reduced to 0.3 seconds from 0.35.
    • Maximum launch range increased to 600 from 500.
Naafiri
  • Eviscerate
    • Cooldown reduced to 10 / 9.5 / 9 / 8.5 / 8 from 11 / 10.5 / 10 / 9.5 / 9.
Neeko
  • Inherent Glamour
    • Bug Fix: No longer allows Neeko to attack and unintentionally gain attack damage and attack speed when transforming into a non-attacking unit.
Orianna
  • Stats
    • Base health reduced to 585 from 600.
  • Command: Dissonance
    • Movement speed modifier reduced to 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 / 40% from 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50%.
Sylas
  • Kingslayer
    • Base damage reduced to 65 / 100 / 135 / 170 / 205 from 70 / 105 / 140 / 175 / 210.
    • Damage AP ratio reduced to 80% AP from 90% AP.
    • Minimum heal AP ratio reduced to 35% AP from 40% AP.
Syndra
  • Transcendent
    • Bug Fix: Now properly grants Syndra her ability power bonus when resurrected.
  • Dark Sphere
    • AP ratio reduced to 60% AP from 70% AP.
Warwick
  • Jaws of the Beast
    • Monster health damage cap increased to 150 / 165 / 180 / 195 / 210 from 100 / 125 / 150 / 175 / 200.
  • Blood Hunt
    • Cooldown reduced to 100 / 85 / 70 / 55 / 40 seconds from 120 / 105 / 90 / 75 / 60.
    • Bonus movement speed increased to 35 / 42.5 / 50 / 57.5 / 65% from 35 / 40 / 45 / 50 / 55%.
Yone
  • Spirit Cleave
    • Base shield changed to 40 − 90 (based on level) from 60 − 80 (based on level).

Arena[]

Gameplay
  • Gate cooldown increased to 12 seconds from 8.
  • Ring of Fire stacking Grievous Wounds per second increased to 20% from 15%.
  • New Effect: Ring of Fire now also applies a debuff that reduces shielding by the same amount as the healing reduction.
Arena-specific balancing
  • Bread and Butter
    • New Effect: Now also affects the cooldown of abilities whose cooldown scales down with attack speed.
  • Bread and Cheese
    • New Effect: Now also affects the cooldown of abilities whose cooldown scales down with attack speed.
  • Bread and Jam
    • New Effect: Now also affects the cooldown of abilities whose cooldown scales down with attack speed.
  • Plaguebearer
    • New Effect: Curse stack tick rate increased to 1.5 seconds from 1.

December 14th Hotfix[]

Arena[]

Gameplay
  • Augments
    • The following augments have been disabled:
      • Dark Blessing, Deathtouch, Desecrator, Doomsayer, Plaguebearer.
